Reviews Package

The reviews package manages all operations related to product reviews, including adding, updating, deleting, flagging, and approving reviews. It ensures a robust and user-friendly review management system for the platform.

Subpackages

The reviews package contains the following subpackages for extended functionalities:

  • Reviews.Tests Package
    • Submodules
    • reviews.tests.profile_reviews module
      • profile_all_tests()
    • reviews.tests.profiler_memory module
      • run_memory_profiling()
    • reviews.tests.test_app module
      • add_test_data()
      • app()
      • client()
      • db_session()
      • get_auth_token()
      • test_add_review()
      • test_approve_review()
      • test_delete_review()
      • test_flag_review()
      • test_get_product_reviews()
      • test_get_review_by_id()
      • test_submit_review_with_profanity()
      • test_update_review()
    • Module Contents

Submodules

The reviews package provides the following modules for core functionality:

reviews.app module

The reviews.app module contains the main application logic for handling review-related operations.

reviews.app.approve_review(review_id)[source]

Approve a review.

Endpoint:

PUT /reviews/approve/<int:review_id>

Path Parameter:

review_id (int): The ID of the review to approve.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘product_manager’]) - Restricts access to admins and product managers.

Returns:

If the review is successfully approved. - 404 Not Found: If the review does not exist. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.delete_review(review_id)[source]

Delete a review.

Endpoint:

DELETE /reviews/<int:review_id>

Path Parameter:

review_id (int): The ID of the review to delete.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘customer’]) - Restricts access to admins and customers.

Returns:

If the review is successfully deleted. - 400 Bad Request: If the user is not authorized. - 404 Not Found: If the review does not exist. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.flag_review(review_id)[source]

Flag a review.

Endpoint:

PUT /reviews/flag/<int:review_id>

Path Parameter:

review_id (int): The ID of the review to flag.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘product_manager’, ‘customer’]) - Restricts access based on roles.

Returns:

If the review is successfully flagged. - 404 Not Found: If the review does not exist. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.get_customer_details(username, headers)[source]

Retrieve customer data from the customer service.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer whose details are to be retrieved.

  • headers (dict) – A dictionary of HTTP headers to include in the request. Typically includes authentication headers.

Returns:

A JSON object containing customer details if the request is successful. rasies an exception

Return type:

dict

reviews.app.get_customer_reviews()[source]

Get all reviews submitted by a specific customer.

Endpoint:

GET /reviews/customer/

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘customer’]) - Restricts access based on roles.

Returns:

JSON list of reviews submitted by the customer. - 404 Not Found: If the customer has no reviews. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.get_item_exists(item_id, headers)[source]

Retrieve item data from the inventory service.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – The username of the customer whose details are to be retrieved.

  • headers (dict) – A dictionary of HTTP headers to include in the request. Typically includes authentication headers.

Returns:

A JSON object containing customer details if the request is successful. rasies an exception

Return type:

dict

reviews.app.get_product_reviews(item_id)[source]

Get all reviews for a specific product.

Endpoint:

GET /reviews/product/<int:item_id>

Path Parameter:

item_id (int): The ID of the product to retrieve reviews for.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘product_manager’, ‘customer’]) - Restricts access based on roles.

Returns:

JSON list of reviews for the specified product. - 404 Not Found: If no reviews exist for the product. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.get_review_details(review_id)[source]

Get details of a specific review.

Endpoint:

GET /reviews/<int:review_id>

Path Parameter:

review_id (int): The ID of the review to retrieve.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘admin’, ‘product_manager’, ‘customer’]) - Restricts access based on roles.

Returns:

JSON object containing the review details. - 404 Not Found: If the review does not exist. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.health_check()[source]

Health check endpoint.

Returns:

If the service and all dependencies are operational. - 500 Internal Server Error: If any dependency is not operational.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

reviews.app.submit_review(item_id)[source]

Submit a new review.

Endpoint:

POST /reviews/<int:item_id>

Path Parameter:

item_id (int): The ID of the product to review.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘customer’, ‘admin’]) - Restricts access to customers and admins.

Request Body:
JSON object containing:

  • rating (int): Rating for the product (required).

  • comment (str): Optional comment for the review.

  • status (str): Optional status of the review (default: “approved”).

Returns:

If the review is successfully submitted. - 404 Not Found: If item doesn’t exist - 400 Bad Request: If validation fails. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 201 Created

reviews.app.update_review(review_id)[source]

Update an existing review.

Endpoint:

PUT /reviews/<int:review_id>

Path Parameter:

review_id (int): The ID of the review to update.

Decorators:

@jwt_required() - Requires authentication via JWT. @role_required([‘customer’]) - Restricts access to customers only.

Request Body:
JSON object containing:

  • rating (int): Updated rating for the product.

  • comment (str): Updated comment for the review.

  • status (str): Updated status of the review.

Returns:

If the review is successfully updated. - 400 Bad Request: If validation fails or if the user is not authorized. - 404 Not Found: If the review does not exist. - 500 Internal Server Error: If an error occurs.

Return type:

  • 200 OK

Module Contents

The reviews module serves as the main entry point for review-related operations.
